name: Spearit (Mounir Tohami)
description:
this game was made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 164 - Theme  'Hurl '.

i will update it later and clean the codes , i hope u enjoy it for now , follow me for more updates . thanks

Controls:

WSAD to Move

Space to dash

Press and hold Left Mouse Button to charge then release to shoot

P to pause
